thread.section_title: WeddingWire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WeddingWire | weddingwire.com
thread.title: Megan Wilson

author: Megan Wilson
title: Megan Wilson
text: Wedding Wire really helped me organize, from their planning tools, check lists, vendor lists, personalize wedding websites it was a big help. Even their emails featured helpful articles that were not just spam. They even have a tool to help create a floor plan for seating and decorations. They had everything I needed and more. Even now just after my wedding they are even helpful with my questions about the thank you notes.
